landing.bio: I'm a nuclear engineer who's also interested in CS and web development. While working on my Master's degree on Reactor Safety, I sharpen my developer skills by trying my hand at different small personal projects and of course lots of curious reading. This site is just a peek into what's coming and will be updated/developed constantly.

interests.paragraphOne: I enjoy being outside in nature and being engaged in farming at our olive & walnut garden. I'm also fascinated by bees and I'm an aspiring beekeeper in training!
interests.paragraphTwo: My other interests consists of cinema, history and sports (especially basketball). I played basketball for different clubs and school teams pretty much all my life.
